languages.text: "Полной грудью, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Уверена, жизнь скоро наладится. Естественно, пока снова не приключится какая-нибудь беда, и она опять не станет дерьмовой. А потом, если повезет, снова наладится. Таков уж круговорот жизни в Просторе, ничего не поделаешь. Но от беспробудного мрака, принесенного госпожой Чорда, вы нас спасли, и все жители станции молятся за вас".

"To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."
languages.original_text: "Полной грудью, {mf|господин|госпожа}! Уверена, жизнь скоро наладится. Естественно, пока снова не приключится какая-нибудь беда, и она опять не станет дерьмовой. А потом, если повезет, снова наладится. Таков уж круговорот жизни в Просторе, ничего не поделаешь. Но от беспробудного мрака, принесенного госпожой Чорда, вы нас спасли, и все жители станции молятся за вас".

And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

languages.text: 「最高ですよ！きっとすぐに何もかも良くなります。つまり、また新しい災難が起こって生活がダメになってしまうまではね。でもその後は、運が良ければまたきっと良くなります。それがエクスパンスの自然の摂理ですから、仕方ないですよ。でもあなたは、レディ・チョーダの支配の息の詰まるような暗闇から私たちを救い出してくれました。今では、フットフォールの住民達全員があなたのご健康をお祈りしています」
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: 「最高ですよ！きっとすぐに何もかも良くなります。つまり、また新しい災難が起こって生活がダメになってしまうまではね。でもその後は、運が良ければまたきっと良くなります。それがエクスパンスの自然の摂理ですから、仕方ないですよ。でもあなたは、レディ・チョーダの支配の息の詰まるような暗闇から私たちを救い出してくれました。今では、フットフォールの住民達全員があなたのご健康をお祈りしています」

languages.text: « Absolument ! Je suis sûre que la situation va vite s'améliorer... enfin, jusqu'à ce qu'une nouvelle catastrophe nous tombe dessus pour nous gâcher la vie. Et après ça, si on a de la chance, la situation s'améliorera à nouveau. C'est notre cycle éternel dans les Étendues, qu'est-ce que vous voulez... Mais vous nous avez sauvés des ténèbres étouffantes du règne de dame Chorda, alors vous pouvez compter sur les habitants de Castel pour prier pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument ! Je suis sûre que la situation va vite s'améliorer... enfin, jusqu'à ce qu'une nouvelle catastrophe nous tombe dessus pour nous gâcher la vie. Et après ça, si on a de la chance, la situation s'améliorera à nouveau. C'est notre cycle éternel dans les Étendues, qu'est-ce que vous voulez... Mais vous nous avez sauvés des ténèbres étouffantes du règne de dame Chorda, alors vous pouvez compter sur les habitants de Castel pour prier pour vous. »

languages.text: “我相当享受这样的生活，大人！我相信，这里的情况很快就会好转。也就是说，好日子会一直持续下去，直到新的灾难来临为止。在那之后，如果我们运气好的话，情况又会再度好转。科罗努斯扩区的循环就是这样，我们还能怎么办呢？不过，是你把我们从库尔达女士令人窒息的黑暗统治下救了出来。如今，落脚港所有居民都在为你的健康祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: “我相当享受这样的生活，大人！我相信，这里的情况很快就会好转。也就是说，好日子会一直持续下去，直到新的灾难来临为止。在那之后，如果我们运气好的话，情况又会再度好转。科罗努斯扩区的循环就是这样，我们还能怎么办呢？不过，是你把我们从库尔达女士令人窒息的黑暗统治下救了出来。如今，落脚港所有居民都在为你的健康祈祷。”

languages.text: "Ganz ausgezeichnet, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Ich bin sicher, die Lage wird sich bald verbessern. Bis zur nächsten Katastrophe, wenn alles wieder ganz furchtbar wird. Und danach, wenn wir Glück haben, wird es wieder besser. Das ist nun mal der Zyklus des Lebens in der Ausdehnung, was will man machen? Aber Ihr habt uns vor der erstickenden Dunkelheit von Lady Chordas Herrschaft gerettet, und alle Bewohner von Footfall beten jetzt für Eure Gesundheit."
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ausgezeichnet, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Ich bin sicher, die Lage wird sich bald verbessern. Bis zur nächsten Katastrophe, wenn alles wieder ganz furchtbar wird. Und danach, wenn wir Glück haben, wird es wieder besser. Das ist nun mal der Zyklus des Lebens in der Ausdehnung, was will man machen? Aber Ihr habt uns vor der erstickenden Dunkelheit von Lady Chordas Herrschaft gerettet, und alle Bewohner von Footfall beten jetzt für Eure Gesundheit."

languages.text: «¡La estoy disfrutando al máximo, {mf|señor|señora}! Seguro que todo irá a mejor a partir de ahora. Bueno, hasta que ocurra algún otro desastre que nos destroce la vida. Y después, las cosas volverán a mejorar, con suerte. En fin, así es el ciclo de la vida en la Extensión, ¿qué le vamos a hacer? Pero usted nos ha rescatado de las asfixiantes garras de Lady Chorda, y ahora toda la gente de Paso le está eternamente agradecida».
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: «¡La estoy disfrutando al máximo, {mf|señor|señora}! Seguro que todo irá a mejor a partir de ahora. Bueno, hasta que ocurra algún otro desastre que nos destroce la vida. Y después, las cosas volverán a mejorar, con suerte. En fin, así es el ciclo de la vida en la Extensión, ¿qué le vamos a hacer? Pero usted nos ha rescatado de las asfixiantes garras de Lady Chorda, y ahora toda la gente de Paso le está eternamente agradecida».

languages.text: "Beğenmek ne kelime efendim, bayıldım! Eminim yakında her şey düzelecektir. Tabii bambaşka bir felaket kapımıza dayanıp bize hayatı zindan etmezse. Şansımız varsa onun ardından da işler yoluna girer. Enginlik'te hayat döngüsü böyle ilerliyor sonuçta, elden ne gelir? Tabii siz bizi Leydi Chorda'nın baskıcı saltanatının karanlığından kurtardınız, o yüzden tüm Binliman halkı artık sağlığınıza duacı."
languages.original_text: "To the fullest, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I'm sure things will improve soon. That is to say, until some new disaster strikes and makes life stink again. And after that, if we're lucky, things will improve again. Such is the circle of life in the Expanse, what can you do? But you're the one who saved us from the suffocating darkness of Lady Chorda's reign, and all the denizens of Footfall now pray for your health."

traits.locale_text: "Beğenmek ne kelime efendim, bayıldım! Eminim yakında işler düzelecektir. Tabii eğer yeniden başka bir felaket kapımıza dayanıp bize hayatı zindan etmezse. Şansımız varsa, bunun ardından da işler yeniden düzelir. Enginlik'te hayat döngüsü böyle ilerliyor sonuçta, elden ne gelir? Tabii siz bizi Leydi Chorda'nın baskıcı saltanatının karanlığından kurtardınız, o yüzden tüm Binliman halkı artık sağlığınız için dua ediyor."
